doc:
Andrew Lincoln https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Andrew_Lincoln 0 Andrew James Clutterbuck (born 14 September 1973), better known by his stage name Andrew Lincoln, is an English actor. His first major role was in the BBC drama This Life, followed by roles such as Simon Casey in the Channel 4 sitcom Teachers and Mark in the Christmas-themed romantic comedy film Love Actually (2003). More recently, he is known for his portrayal of Rick Grimes, the lead character in the AMC post-apocalyptic horror television series—based on the eponymous comic book series—The Walking Dead (2010–2018). Andrew_James_Clutterbuck ( born 14_September_1973 ) , better_known by his_stage_name_Andrew_Lincoln , is an_English_actor . His_first_major_role was in the_BBC_drama This_Life , followed by roles such_as Simon_Casey in the_Channel_4_sitcom_Teachers and Mark in the_Christmas-themed_romantic_comedy_film_Love_Actually_(_2003_) . More_recently , he is_known for his_portrayal of Rick_Grimes , the_lead_character in the_AMC_post-apocalyptic_horror_television_series — based on the_eponymous_comic_book_series — The_Walking_Dead_(_2010 – 2018_) .
